attributes.action:
Help to join
Keep shauns head stone
attributes.additional_details: We are battling to keep this head stone after someone had put a petition up to remove the head stone, it was passed by the church committee when first applied for it to but put up but on the 7th of August applied petition was started and on the 7th of September it is been review come on help us keep this head stone
attributes.background: My cousin was killed in 2010 and we are still fighting after fighting for the right justice which wasn't giving, we are now battling to keep his head Stone as well

rejection.details:
The placing of a head stone is not something that the UK Government or Parliament could help you with.

It seems from your petition that the decision lies in the hands of the church committee. It would probably be most effective to raise this issue with your church at a local level.

You may also want to raise this issue with your locally elected representatives, such as local councillors.
